chilliwebs.ezjdo.com.annotations

Annotation Type Column


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Column
    Indicates a custom column name for a object member.

    Because annotations are processable when the object is being instantiated it makes using annotations for default values the best way to set up the object, this is because field values are not set before the constructor executes therefore java reflections will not suffice.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean ignore
      mark this attribute as not a database column.
      int length
      the length attribute for the annotation.
      java.lang.String name
      the name attribute for the annotation.
      boolean notNull
      the notNull attribute for the annotation.
      java.lang.String sqlType
      the sqlType attribute for the annotation.
